explains: adj. 过早的，提早的；早产的；草率的，仓促的
wordGroup: premature ejaculation 早泄，射精过早
premature death 过早死亡；早逝
premature failure 过早失效；过早破坏
premature babies 早产儿室；早产的婴儿
premature ovarian failure 卵巢功能早衰
premature rupture of membrane 胎膜早破

sentences.en: The baby was four weeks premature.
Premature babies have to be fed intravenously.
sentences.cn: 早产儿必须通过静脉输入来喂食。

sentences.en: Premature birth is the main cause of perinatal mortality.
sentences.cn: 早产是围产期死亡的主要原因。
